level_1.name: Adaptive Modification
level_1.description: Alter targets to withstand specific environmental conditions without needing to eat, drink, or breathe

level_1.name: Aspect of Elegance
level_1.description: Render target clean, groomed, and wearing holographic outfit that cannot be dirtied

level_1.name: Cerebral Buffer Regeneration
level_1.description: Restore 1 + (level/3) Effort to a friendly Psychic or Adept, once per day

level_1.name: Energetic Construct Evocation
level_1.description: Create solid object up to 2x2x1m per level from metadimensional force, lasts 1 hour/level

level_1.name: Evoked Image Projection
level_1.description: Create visual illusion in 3m radius, intangible and soundless but movable

level_1.name: Implanted Whim
level_1.description: Touch charges skin; next touch implants minor impulse in target (Mental save to resist)

level_1.name: Manipulatory Shadow Manifestation
level_1.description: Summon a Manipulatory Shadow that manipulates objects with suicidal obedience

level_1.name: Neural Burn Cascade
level_1.description: Blast visible target for 1d6+1 psychic damage per 3 levels. Induces Surge

level_1.name: Personal Shielding Field
level_1.description: Grant AC 15 + (level/2), functions as vacc suit, protects from radiation. Requires Light Focus

level_1.name: Variant MES Perception
level_1.description: Visually perceive MES signatures, detect Arcanists, Magisters, Psychics on sight

level_1.name: Void Flow Scan
level_1.description: See metadimensional energy flows, detect active magic and trace it to caster. Requires Light Focus

level_1.name: Void Slip
level_1.description: Teleport up to 10m to visible location. Can cast as On Turn with Surge

level_1.name: Void Transceiver Emanation
level_1.description: Create mental comm grid with 4 targets/level, 10,000km range. Requires Deep Focus

level_2.name: Aversive Impulse Projection
level_2.description: Create intense mental aversion to action in target (Mental save). Can be cast silently

level_2.name: Blindside Skip
level_2.description: Target doesn't notice caster's actions for 1 round/2 levels unless threatened (Mental save)

level_2.name: Combat Shadow Manifestation
level_2.description: Manifest Myrmidon Shadow that fights until destroyed or Light Focus dropped. Induces Surge

level_2.name: Concussive Pinhole Gate
level_2.description: Explosion at visible point within 100m for 2d6 damage in 3m (Physical save for half). Induces Surge

level_2.name: Doppleganger Manifestation
level_2.description: Create copy of self with 1 HP, AC 10. Can act as either real or copy. Lasts while Deep Focus held

level_2.name: Genetic Privacy Field
level_2.description: Cloak genetic signature from scans/spells, can mimic specific DNA. Requires Light Focus

level_2.name: Ghost Field Emission
level_2.description: 2m radius invisibility bubble around caster. Blocks lasers. Requires Deep Focus

level_2.name: Patterned Energy Flare
level_2.description: Cut hole in inanimate object up to (level/3)m thick. Induces Surge

level_2.name: Shadow Adjutant Manifestation
level_2.description: Summon Minion Shadow that obeys dutifully. Requires Deep Focus, lasts 10 min/level after

level_2.name: Shadow Disruption Rubric
level_2.description: Damage Shadow for 1d6/level (Mental save for half). Auto-dispel if HD ≤ level/2. Induces Surge

level_2.name: Universal Translator Rubric
level_2.description: Perfectly understand target and be understood, but bluntness gives -2 to social checks. Requires Light Focus

level_3.name: Arcane Grounding
level_3.description: End all arcane spells in 5m of visible point, damage Shadows 1d6/level (Physical save)

level_3.name: Cryptographic Control Protocol
level_3.description: Detect and decode hidden messages, or imbue object with telepathic message for recipient

level_3.name: Extradimensional Pocket
level_3.description: Create cyst holding 1 person + gear or 30 items. Requires Deep Focus + 1 hour/level

level_3.name: Gravitic Control Rubric
level_3.description: Grant target flight at normal movement rate. Requires Light Focus, max 1 scene

level_3.name: Hot Zone Invocation
level_3.description: 5m radius invisible radiation zone, 2×level damage/turn. Requires Deep Focus. Induces Surge

level_3.name: Kinetic Siphon
level_3.description: Slow target to 10m/round or lose every other round's actions. Requires Light Focus

level_3.name: Metadimensional Power Font
level_3.description: Recharge and maintain power cells for 1 object/level. Requires Light Focus

level_3.name: Projectile Repulsion Field
level_3.description: 5m bubble reduces incoming projectile damage by caster level. Requires Deep Focus. Induces Surge

level_3.name: Quantum Jamming Field
level_3.description: Disable remote control in 50m/level, jam civilian comms, halt military comms 1 min/level

level_3.name: Random Organic Failure
level_3.description: Target mortally wounded in 6 rounds (Physical save). Costs caster 1d6 damage per 2 target HD. Induces Surge

level_3.name: Shadow Puppetry
level_3.description: Remotely control summoned Shadow anywhere in system. Costs 1 System Strain. Death requires Physical save or drop to 0 HP

level_4.name: Cerebral Scramble Code
level_4.description: Stun enemies in 10m for 1 round/level. Failed Mental save randomizes their actions. Induces Surge

level_4.name: Clairvoyance Window Probe
level_4.description: View location within 10m/level, can drop 1kg object through. Lasts 1 scene

level_4.name: Energy Amplification Boost
level_4.description: Boost 1 target/level: +level/2 damage, +2 hit, weapons count as Heavy. Requires Light Focus

level_4.name: Orbital Insertion
level_4.description: Cast as Instant. Drop from orbit safely with 1 ally/level, concealed from detection

level_4.name: Solid Image Matrix
level_4.description: Create 10m cube audiovisual illusion with light tactile feedback. Takes 2×level HP to destroy. Requires Light Focus

level_4.name: Spatial Realignment Warp
level_4.description: Teleport 1 target/level to point within 30m (Mental save to resist). Induces Surge

level_4.name: Spatial Ripcord Shift
level_4.description: Set ripcord on ally; they can trigger within 1 hour/level to teleport back to casting location

level_5.name: Devourer Manifestation
level_5.description: Summon horrific Devourer Shadow for 2 rounds/level. Breaks free if doesn't kill each round

level_5.name: Gravcar Pattern Instantiation
level_5.description: Manifest gravcar from metadimensional energy, self-repairs 5 HP/hour, lasts 24 hours

level_5.name: Metadimensional Passage
level_5.description: Make self + 1 target/level intangible, can pass through matter. Costs 1 System Strain/round/target

level_5.name: Protocol Amplification
level_5.description: Cast as Instant when casting another spell. Roll effect dice twice, take better. Saving throws at -Cast Magic penalty. Induces Surge

level_5.name: Psychic Compulsion Induction
level_5.description: Implant overwhelming compulsion in target. Lasts while Deep Focus held + 1 day/level. Induces Haze

level_5.name: Uncontrolled Metadimensional Rift
level_5.description: 1-10m radius explosion for 1d6/level (Physical save for half). Caster takes half damage. Induces Surge

level_5.name: Void Barrier Instantiation
level_5.description: Create 3m high wall, 3m/level long. Crossing deals 1d6 per 2 levels (Physical save for half), counts as Heavy

level_5.name: Zero Energy Sink
level_5.description: Drain all power cells in 10m radius (Mental save for living bearers). Remote power suppressed 1 round/level. Induces Surge
